thread.title: Watch Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones in the Collide Movie Trailer
thread.title_full: Watch Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones in the Collide Movie Trailer

author: Silas Lesnick
title: Watch Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones in the Collide Movie Trailer
text:
SHARE Watch Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones in the new Collide movie trailer 
Open Road Films has just brought online a new Collide movie trailer. In the player below, you can take a look at the new actioner starring Nicholas Hoult ( X-Men: Apocalypse ) and Felicity Jones ( Rogue One: A Star Wars Story ). Catch it in theaters February 24! 
RELATED: Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones Are on the Run in the First Collide Trailer 
After a heist goes terribly wrong, Casey Stein (Hoult) finds himself on the run from a ruthless gang headed by mob boss Hagen ( Sir Anthony Hopkins ). Now Casey has precious cargo that belongs to Hagen, who will stop at nothing to retrieve it. Left with no choice, Casey calls his former employer and drug smuggler Geran ( Sir Ben Kingsley ) to protect his long-time girlfriend Juliette (Jones) before Hagen gets his hands on her. Casey sets out on an adrenaline-fueled car chase on the German highways to save the love of his life before it’s too late. 
Written by Eran Creevy and F. Scott Frazier and directed by Creevy ( Welcome to the Punch ), Collide opens in theaters on February 24. That’s the same weekend as Jordan Peele’s directorial debut, Get Out , director Colm McCarthy’s dystopian tale The Girl with All the Gifts , and the animated family adventure Rock Dog , featuring Luke Wilson as the voice of a Tibetan mastiff who decides to follow his dream of becoming a rock and roll star. Collide , at one time in development under the title Autobahn , was originally planned for release last August but was delayed due to Relativity Media’s bankruptcy .
